Overview[]: Miles is a caring and supportive husband to Hilde . He and Hilde are shown to love each other greatly, always making sure to celebrate their anniversaries. He encourages Hilde when she makes a Hilltop coin and tells her to make more. Tragically, while they are happily on their way to the fair, Miles and Hilde are killed and their faces are used by the Whisperers .
Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Miles' life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Miles and Hilde discovered the Hilltop on one of their anniversaries after fighting walkers in the woods. Over the years, they become trusted members of the community. As he and several other Hilltoppers prepare to leave for the fair, Miles kisses his wife and celebrates their anniversary. He comments that the fair attendees will love the handcrafted wooden coins she has made. Unfortunately, while traveling through the woods, the Hilltop caravan was attacked by Alpha and the Whisperers. Miles was killed and his face was skinned and later worn by a Whisperer that night.
Death[]: Killed By Alpha (Caused or Direct) The Whisperers Miles is ambushed in the woods by Alpha and is killed. His face is later used as a Whisperer mask.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Miles has killed: Numerous counts of zombies
Name: Miles
